item.title: Imaging tools
item.description: Confocal Microscopy Commercial Leica: Leica-SP8 (Archived Product Replaced by STELLARIS 5 & STELLARIS 8) ZEISS: Two-Photon Microscopy Cranial window surgery Protocol, by Jun-Liszt Li [Download PDF] Lab DIY Thorlabs: https://www.thorlabs.com/index.cfm Ti:Sapphire Femtosecond Laser: From Thorlabs AO (Adaptive optics) in 2PFM and for neurobiology Commercial Olympus: FVMPE-RS Leica: Leica-MP-4Tune Scientifica: Multiphoton Imaging System Ref labs: Ji Na lab, University of California, Berkeley Janelia farm In this talk, two-photon microscopy-which uses strong pulsed infrared lasers to produce detailed images inside biological samples-is introduced.
